ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s stardate 2378 and Benjamin Sisko has finally returned from the Bajoran Wormhole-omnipotent-but with every minute, his godhood is failing. Sent by the Prophets on a mission to the deepest parts of space aboard the U.S.S. Theseus, he witnesses the unthinkable-Someone is killing the gods. And only Sisko and his motley crew of Starfleet members from every era of Trek can stop them.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 05:40:41. [CVDB952415]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/star-trek-1/4000-952415/

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ángel Hernández, David Aja, Declan Shalvey, Fran Gamboa, Francesco Francavilla, Lee Loughridge, Rachael Stott, Ramon Rosanas
ComicInfo.Characters: Benjamin Sisko, Data, Descheeni, Dr. Beverly Crusher, Jake Sisko, Jean-Luc Picard, Kira Nerys, Lily Sato, Montgomery Scott, Spot, T'Lir, Tom Paris
ComicInfo.Teams: Bajorans, Deep Space Nine Crew, Starfleet, USS Theseus Crew
ComicInfo.Locations: Celestial Temple, Deep Space Nine, Hephaestus Nebula
